sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by mharty

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Verbena urticifolia XX Ilysanthes 3 or 4 days X back flat E of Clam Shell Shore Large form of arrowhead 2 or more days Woodcock at the spring under clam-shell. Campnaula aparinoides ap. 3 or 4 days Th eclover heads are turned brown & dry & white weed is also drying up. I think that that is the water dock just opening XXX in J.P. Brown’s meadow. Disturbed 2 broods of partridges this Pm –One 1/3 old as anxious as ever rushing to me with the courage of a hen. Columbines still- What is that Potamogeton well out at E guttata ditch? A few 3 4 or 5 small green floating leaves –about 2 inches long. –short stout penduncle & cylindrical spike- immersed leaves numerous linear 3/16 inch wide wavey margined 4 to 6 or 7 inch long –pellucid brown. & pointed. ap. sessile.”
"XVII / 13 February-3 September 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:23 / PE 8, p.223 vol.8; Torrey JVI & JVII, p.#"
